item.title: The Tandoor restaurant will be reopening on February 14th at the Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
item.description: Source: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre. Selected highlights from Tandoor’s menu. The Indian restaurant Tandoor will reopen its doors on February 14, 2023, after a two-year hiatus. Established in 1985, the restaurant boasts a refreshed, modern interior and serves authentic North Indian cuisine. Chef Sunder, an award-winning chef, leads the culinary team at Tandoor, offering both Ã la carte and set menus. The menu reflects India’s diverse culinary traditions.
